attributes.additional_details:
Its not your choice to force people to have a injection that is still in trial period, and its up to the people to decide if they want it or not and have it held against them, you have no right to force people to have it.
More people are dying because of the injection so stats say.
attributes.background:
No to vaccine passports and no to saying people who haven't had it cant do this or do that.
Why are you forcing people to have it?

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the below petition which is currently open on this topic:

Outlaw discrimination against those who do not get a Covid-19 vaccination
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
